mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT bid, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, create_date FROM board ORDER BY create_date DESC, bno DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT bid, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, create_date FROM board
mapper.select: ORDER BY create_date DESC, bid DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.delete: delete from board where bid = #{bid} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where bid = #{bid} and writer = #{writer}

choose.otherwise: and (title like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%') or content like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: Select Count(*) from board where true
